synopsis.text:
From the shadows emerges Golgo 13, an enigmatic assassin with an unmatched reputation for lethality. When he eliminates the heir of global magnate Leonard Dawson, he unwittingly triggers a relentless manhunt that threatens his very existence. Driven by vengeance, Dawson deploys the full might of the CIA, FBI, and the U.S. military to eliminate the elusive hitman, as his obsession consumes his sanity.

In a deadly game of cat and mouse, Golgo 13 must navigate a treacherous landscape of betrayal and deception, where every corner hides a potential threat. With the resources of a billionaire hell-bent on his destruction, the assassin faces his most formidable challenge yet. As the hunter becomes the hunted, the stakes have never been higher in this pulse-pounding thriller that will leave you questioning who truly holds the power. Will Golgo 13 survive the relentless onslaught, or will Leonard Dawson finally achieve the vengeance he so desperately seeks?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
